config.mcai.general.format.description: Iformati yemithandazo ikwenzakalise ukuba imithandazo yakho izakwenzakalisa kanjani kwi-AI. {name} isisetshenziselwa umyalelo wakho, kwaye {message} isisetshenziselwa ithethi oyikhethile.
config.mcai.general.replyFormat.descript: Iformati yekujibu ikwenzakalise kanjani izithethi zika-AI zizakwenzakalisa xa zithunyelwa kwi-chat yeMinecraft. Lo mpendulo ivumele kwaye kuzo nezinye iintetho zokubhala, ukuze izithethi zika-AI zifanele kwi-chat.
config.mcai.general.authorization.descri: Le tokoni yokunqatyelwa yakho ye-AI account. Yifumane kwi https://c.ai -> Hlela Isikhala -> I-Application -> I-Local Storage -> char_token -> ivale.
config.mcai.general.registerAndUnregiste: I-Level le-Command leqenyelelweyo kulula kufuneka ikwazi ukuba iminwe yokwenza izithethi ezikwenza izinto ezixhunyanayo. Kwanele kwezi qoqosho ezimbalwa ezisebenzisa izilwanyana /ai register kunye ne /ai unregister.
config.mcai.ais.name: Igama
config.mcai.ais.name.description: Lo nguqulo oluyisebenzisa i-Reply Format xa iyakwenzakalisa i-responses ye-AI.
config.mcai.ais.id.description: Lo nguqulo oluyisebenzisa i-character ID. Uyakuthola i-character ID kwi https://c.ai ngokuqwalasela i-chat nge-character kwaye kungekho okwenzakalayo ngaphambi ko 'char='.
config.mcai.ais.history_id.description: I-ID yehistori inguqulo oluyasebenzisa i-ID yekhetho yakho ethile. Ukuze uqale /ai chat entsha uzakwenzela i-ID yehistori entsha, kunye nokwenza kube kokuqala kwixhosa.
config.mcai.ais.aliases.description: I-Aliases zinamaqulathe ezilula ongazenza kuba nguqulo ngo-chat ne-AI. Ngexabiso, xa izinamaqulathe zikhoyo zifuna 'hello', ungayifaka kwi-chat ngesi- '@hello' ukuthetha no-AI, kunye noyaqonda.
